TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit WeakEventManager/ListenerList extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于存储 的侦听器的内置集合列表。

span.span: Provides a built-in collection list for storing listeners for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此列表包含类似于定义的那些成员和，并提供类似的功能，此类实现上述两个接口。Although this list contains members that resemble those defined by and , and provide similar functionality, this class implements neither of those interfaces. 大多数派生的类无需使用任何成员上。Most derived classes do not need to use any members on . 方法并使用默认值在内部，每个列表`source`。The methods and use a default internally, one list for each `source`. 只需调用方法如果你类维护具有相同的事件源组合到不同的事件的条件的帐户创建每个列表的多个列表。You only need to call methods if your class maintains multiple lists for the same event-source combination, with each list created to account for different conditions of the event. 在这种情况下，您不会使用并并应改为实现`AddListener`或`RemoveListener`执行操作中只是其中之一的内部侦听器列表中，通常基于一个参数，它将添加到侦听器`AddListener`或`RemoveListener`.In this case, you would not use and and would instead implement `AddListener` or `RemoveListener` to act upon listeners in just one of the internal listener lists, typically based on a parameter that you add to `AddListener` or `RemoveListener`. 此外，不能只是调用接收原始事件的处理程序实现; 必须改为跟踪的事件的详细信息和事件将只传送到相应的列表使用。Also, the handler implementation that receives the raw event cannot simply call ; you must instead keep track of the specifics of the event and deliver the event only to the appropriate list using . 各种方法的以便您可以使用内部列表，并可以防止事件的实际传送过程中修改列表提供。The various methods of are provided so that you can work with your internal lists and so that you can prevent modification of the list during actual delivery of the event. 使用此实现技术的示例类是，并保留单独的侦听器列表`PropertyChanged`根据更改的属性。An example class that used this implementation technique is , which maintains separate listener lists for `PropertyChanged` based on which property changed. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 不能使用此类[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot use this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

span.span: The listener element to add to the .

summary.span: 将 对象添加到 中。

span.span: Adds a object to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象提供侦听器应如此，它实现接口，并因此具有一个有效的实现。The object provided as listener should be a that implements the interface and therefore has a working implementation. 应始终调用然后再更改列表的内容。You should always call before changing the list contents. 否则为列表可能正在传送事件，因此原始处于锁定状态。Otherwise, the list may be in process of delivering events and therefore the original is locked. 调用更改输入`list`要克隆，以便你调用仍可在克隆上工作。Calling changes the input `list` to be a clone so that your call can still work on the clone. 如果返回`true`，可能需要更新对你的代码的其他区域中维护的列表的任何私有引用。If returns `true`, you might need to update any private references to the list that you maintain in other areas of your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool BeginUse() cil managed

summary.span: 声明列表正在使用中。

span.span: Declares the list to be in use.

summary.span: 这可以防止在列表项迭代过程中直接更改列表。

span.span: This prevents direct changes to the list during iterations of the list items.

returns.span: 如果列表已经声明为正在使用中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the list was already declared to be in use; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个实现应调用之前循环访问列表以将事件传递到侦听器，并应调用完成时。A implementation should call before iterating through the list to deliver an event to the listeners, and should call when it is done. 这会阻止另一个调用方的事件交付迭代正在进行时修改的列表。This prevents another caller from modifying the list while the iteration for purposes of event delivery is in progress. 如果在此期间修改列表，则克隆列表。If the list is modified during this time, then the list is cloned. 如果克隆列表，然后返回`true`，这意味着丢失了最后一次传递中的最新侦听器更改。If the list is cloned, then returns `true`, which means that you have missed a recent listener change in the last delivery.

span.span: if the list is empty; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等效于检查是否为零，并且不检查任何引用列表中是否现在过时。This method is equivalent to checking whether the is zero, and does not check whether any of the references in the list are now stale. 如果你想要确保所有引用都都仍然有效，请调用之前检查空状态的列表。If you want to assure that all references are still valid, call just prior to checking the empty status of the list.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool PrepareForWriting(class System.Windows.WeakEventManager/ListenerList& list) cil managed
Public Shared Function PrepareForWriting (ByRef list As WeakEventManager.ListenerList) As Boolean

param.name: list
param.span: 要检查其使用状态和可能副本的列表。

span.span: The list to check for use state and potentially copy.

summary.span: 检查是否正在使用提供的列表，如果正在使用，则将列表引用参数设置为该列表的副本，而不是原稿列表的副本。

span.span: Checks to see whether the provided list is in use, and if so, sets the list reference parameter to a copy of that list rather than the original.

returns.span: 如果调用时正在使用提供的列表，并因此 参数引用被重置为副本，则为 。

span.span: if the provided list was in use at the time of call and therefore the parameter reference was reset to be a copy.

returns.span: 如果未使用提供的列表，在此情况下 参数引用保持不变，则为 。

span.span: if the provided list was not in use, in which case the parameter reference remains unaltered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是使用给定的列表 （这意味着当前正被传递事件），调用此方法将替换输入`list`使用克隆。If the given list is in use (which means an event is currently being delivered), calling this method will replace the input `list` with a clone. 现有用户将完成将事件传送到原始列表中，而无需干扰更改到新列表。The existing users will finish delivering the event to the original list, without interference from changes to the new list. 如果该方法返回`true`，调用方可能想要在他们自己的数据结构中插入新列表，因为这表示提供的列表不再是最新的可能性。If the method returns `true`, callers may want to insert the new list in their own data structures, since this indicates the possibility that the provided list is no longer current. 此方法调用在内部，然后立即调用。This method calls internally and then immediately calls . 因此调用本身不会导致在列表上的锁。Therefore calling does not itself introduce a lock on the list. 即使克隆复制完成后调用执行辅助操作。Even the clone copy is done as a secondary operation after calling .

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a listener item from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应始终调用然后再更改列表的内容。You should always call before changing the list contents. 否则为列表可能正在传送事件，因此原始处于锁定状态。Otherwise, the list may be in process of delivering events and therefore the original is locked. 调用更改输入`list`要克隆，以便你调用仍可在克隆上工作。Calling changes the input `list` to be a clone so that your call can still work on the clone. 如果返回`true`，可能需要更新对你的代码的其他区域中维护的列表的任何私有引用。If returns `true`, you might need to update any private references to the list that you maintain in other areas of your code.
